short_summary: ONE NEW 20-FT REEFER CONTAINER FOR THE STORAGE OF MARINE GEOSCIENCE
description: ONE NEW 20-FT REEFER CONTAINER FOR THE STORAGE OF MARINE GEOSCIENCE COLLECTION SAMPLES
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Invitation to Bid

**Notice ID**

* Title: 20 ft Reefer Container
* Solicitation Number: WS4419329943
* Amendment Number: 5
* Reference Number: WS4419329943-Doc4511721668
* Publication Date: April 2, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 6, 2024, at 14:00
* Amendment Date: April 26, 2024

**Project Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Contractors to submit tenders for the provision of one (1) new 20-foot reefer container for the storage of Marine Geoscience collection samples on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan). The delivery location is Halifax.

**Key Project Details**

* UNSPSC Code: 24110000 (Containers and storage)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Trahan, Shawn (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders must submit their tenders in accordance with the solicitation documents and requirements. The lowest price for the project will be the selection criterion for evaluating tenders.

**Procedural Information**

* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. To make such a request, Bidders must contact the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from the date of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* Reference the solicitation for further details.

**Notice URL**

The complete solicitation document is available on the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19282945?extsite=MTkyODI5NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

 Note to the reader: Please refer to the original document to ensure compliance with the format restrictions. 

The rewritten text follows these guidelines:

* All numbers and dates are formatted consistently.
* Key project details are easy to locate.
* The text is concise and follows an easy-to-understand format.
